unnormalised: Arre, tumkam PM Poshan Scheme vishim mahit asa? Aiklaं, tem sarkari shalleanim madhyahn bhojanak modot korta ani soglleank.
normalised: Arre, tumkam P-M Poshan Scheme vishim mahit asa gai? Aikola ki sarkari shalleanim madhyanha bhojanak ani soglleak madat karta mhunn.
text: Arre, tumkam PM Poshan Scheme vishim mahit asa? Aiklaं, tem sarkari shalleanim madhyahn bhojanak modot korta ani soglleank.
